name: Grunwald 1710
description:
Grunwald 1710 is a retro-style FPS with sprite based enemies  and challenging one hit kill combat with a wide array of weapons, modern systems and controls mixed with a stylish presentation and great music.

Grunwald 1710 tells an alternative history version of the story of the Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth. Play as a citizen of Tilzit caught up in the war between the Commonwealth and the Teutonic order. You will have to do your bit to ensure your way of life may continue- but for how long?



MinimumRecommended Operating SystemWindows 7 64-bitWindows 10 64-bit ProcessorQuad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster.Intel 9700k or AMD 3700X processor. Memory8GB RAM16GB RAM Video CardNVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higherNVIDIA GTX 1650 or AMD Radeon RX 570 series card or higher.


Music

  • Theme song and Marienburg theme by: Phil McClean (Used with permission from the artist)

Models

  • Various 3D models from CGTrader and other free resources. 
  • Various packs from the Unreal Marketplace.

Effects

  • Various FX from Pixabay and Freesound.
